message: Very Useful Schedule for Static Operators used to create streams for RxJs :
story: Hossam Ahmed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Reactive-Extensions/RxJS
caption: github.com
description: RxJS - The Reactive Extensions for JavaScript

data.message:
Be careful though. This is for RxJS 4 not 5.
Try http://reactivex.io/rxjs/ for RxJS 5.

When you see github.com/Reactive-Extensions/RxJS, it's RxJS 4.
RxJS lives at https://github.com/ReactiveX/rxjs -- Note the `ReactiveX` piece instead of `Reactive-Extensions`.

Note that when you click on RxJS on reactivex.io, it'll take you to the wrong github repo.

You can just append /rxjs to the URL for the right page
http://reactivex.io/rxjs/
Go to the bottom of this page, and you'll find the updated equivalent of this decision tree. It's even dynamic! You click on the choice, and only then you see the branches that match this choice.
